skdetail:

Invocation Name: purity chiropractic post
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill will arm you with the information that your body is amazing and designed to be healthy. 

Chiropractic is a natural approach to a person’s health and well-being by naturally aiding the body to heal itself, without the use of drugs and not resorting to surgery. Contrary to most peoples understanding about chiropractic, the focus is not on the spine and bones, Chiropractics focus is on the nervous system. It just happens that the spine is the part of the body that irritates the nervous system. thus, reducing the ability of the body to work effectively.

In chiropractic care, the body is adjusted. The adjustments target the body and nervous system and not the condition. 

At Purity Chiropractic we specialize in upper cervical chiropractic. Upper cervical chiropractic is a specific method of care that a lot of people seek due to it being a very gentle technique with no cracking of the neck yet extremely powerful at relieving the irritation to the nervous system. 

Chiropractic care gives no definite time of healing as it relies on the body’s natural time and ability to heal. Upper cervical care is done to restore the balance of the body and reactivate the ability of the body to heal itself naturally.

Disclaimer: 
The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
